comments.body: Maybe a doc comment about what the parameters are for and their contract?

comments.body: no need for the brackets around null.
This was calling the real fsUtils in the test. Rather than inject it I replaced this with roughly equivalent code. I'm not sure how useful ensureDirectoryExists actually is.
The tests have not been updated for this yet, but flutter_test depends on test_api, so this is non-breaking
